addVault(address).notice: adds new vault to which deposits can be batched

claim(address,address,uint256).notice: claim the shares received from depositing batch

depositToken(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: convert the token into glp and obtain staked glp and deposits sGLP into vault

depositToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: convert the token into glp and obtain staked glp

executeBatchDeposit().notice: executes batch and deposits into appropriate vault with/without minting shares

glpBalance(address,address).notice: get the glp balance for a given vault and account address

glpBalanceAllVaults(address).notice: gives the combined pending glp balance from all registered vaults

grantAllowances(address).notice: grants the allowance to the vault to pull sGLP (via safeTransfer from in vault.deposit)

pauseDeposit().notice: pauses deposits (to prevent DOS due to GMX 15 min cooldown)

roundDeposits(address,uint256).notice: get the info for given vault and round

roundGlpBalance(address).notice: get the glp balance for current active round

setKeeper(address).notice: sets the keeper address (to pause & unpause deposits)

unclaimedShares(address,address).notice: get the unclaimed shares for a given vault and account address

userDeposits(address,address).notice: get the state of user deposits
